TopicTitle: The Best Visual Mods For Planet Kerbin

Articles.Content:
Hi

I'm curious to know if anyone has come up with their own visuals for Planet Kerbin, for example cloud templates etc. 

I've been looking for a Kerbin which has a deep blue look as shown in this picture... [http://imgur.com/35Mk1QI](http://imgur.com/35Mk1QI) I took that picture from the YouTube video Astronomer's Visual Pack but when I download the mod Kerbin looks nothing like it does in the video. I've tried both Ren and Better Atmospheres and while they're both awesome mods I can't quite get Kerbin to have that deep blue look!

I know it's possible to use 'Alt + n' to edit the layers myself but I have no idea what I'm doing so I'm hoping someone can help! Literally all I want is that deep blue atmosphere look!

Thanks ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-24T23:29:54Z" title="04/24/2015 11:29  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 24, 2015</time> by DaveyLeo10**

Scatterer. While it is still in development, and there are no clouds, it is one of the most beautiful mods for the game. Expect clouds soon though, as blackjack is working with rbray, the creator of the EVE plugin.

[It can be found here.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115408-WIP-Scatterer-atmospheric-scattering-mod?p=1833562)

SmallFatFetus
This request for Add-ons has been moved to General Add-on Affairs.
Did you try and play around with planet shines settings ?

> 
> Did you try and play around with planet shines settings ?

I've had a look but i don't know what to change!
